text: The 1998–99 Tetley's Bitter Rugby Union County Championship was the 99th edition of England's County Championship rugby union club competition. Cornwall won their third title after defeating Gloucestershire in the final. == Final == {| width="80%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |-
